attributes.action: Thames path national trail cycle super-highway
attributes.additional_details:
The Thames path is a low risk route for cyclists that takes you right into the heart of central London and potentially used by thousands of cyclists from Sunbury and Hounslow in the west  to Dartford and Darenth in the east.

I would like the goverment to invest in a dedicated cycle and pedestrian route right into the heart of the capital and really promote cyling with a low risk route for many thousands of cyclist willing to commute to the city centre along the river.

The Thames Path Trail needs no introduction as the main artery that runs through the beating heart of London.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor and Greater London Assembly.
